DOC.criteria: Healthy male female , active duty military service member DoD beneficiary , eligible receive care DGMC . Ages 1840 year old Participants must willing refrain caffeine energy drink use 48 hour prior study day 1 8 . They must also refrain consume additional caffeine energy drink 24hour observation time day 12 89 . Cardiovascular risk factor : Heart rhythm normal sinus , history atrial ventricular arrhythmia , family history premature sudden cardiac death age 60 , leave ventricular hypertrophy , atherosclerosis , hypertension , palpitation , Twave abnormality , baseline correct QT ( QTc ) interval great 440 millisecond ( m ) . This determine ECG obtain initial screening appointment , review cardiologist questionnaire response participant . Blood pressure initial screen appointment baseline study Day 1 great 140/90 Presence know medical condition , confirm participant interview . Examples : Hypertension Thyroid disease Type 1 2 diabetes mellitus Recurrent headache Depression , currently receive treatment ( due possible drug interaction ) Any psychiatric condition neurological disorder History alcohol drug abuse previous 5 year Ever diagnose told renal hepatic dysfunction Concurrent use ANY medication take daily basis , include herbal product supplement . Daily basis define great 2 day per week . Pregnant lactating female exclude participation urine dipstick test use confirm pregnancy ( pregnancy test perform treatment session , day 1 8 ) All nonEnglish speaking / write subject understand study consent process exclude study due unavailability medical qualify translator time study .
